txt.en: The Lossoth blame the harsh winter on the invading Angmarim and have asked for your help in driving them away.

'Hail, [placeholder]! You have come far in your travels... I can tell by your strange clothes but also the look in your eye; it is that of a true warrior!

'We have had many troubles of late -- more than the Elders would dare speak about openly -- I myself have seen the Rauta-väki from Angmar with their dark weapons, and they seek to bring war upon my people. I will not stand for it while I still draw breath!

'If you would give the warriors of Sûri-kylä aid we would be greatly in your debt. Seek out the threat from the South and aid us in crushing it! The Rauta-väki can be found in their camp along the path to the lands called Forodwaith, south and east of Sûri-kylä. Bring me their weapons as proof of your deeds.'
The camps of the Angmarim are south and east of Sûri-kylä, near the Pass of Forodwaith.\n\nPasi has asked you to help defeat the invading Angmarim.
'Impressive. You must be a mighty warrior of your people, [placeholder]. Come, we have more to do.'
Pasi is at Sûri-kylä, north and west of the Angmarim encampment.\n\nYou should return at once to Pasi and show him the weapons of the Angmarim.
'How goes your task? Have you brought me the weapons?\n\n'The camp of the Rauta-väki lies to the south and east of Sûri-kylä along the road to the land of Forodwaith.'
'You have not yet gathered enough weapons, [placeholder].'
'We still have many battles left to fight, [placeholder].'
Bring the Angmarim weapons to Pasi
